converse.line: You are a being of absolute purity, tarnished by the hand of fate.
A sole lantern, covered with the mud of your neighbors.
How unfortunate you are, burning where no one can see you.
You've seen sadness and suffering, your life plagued by circumstance.
Never once seen the sun in all its glory.
Short and long, the hours pass, yet no hope in sight for you.
You've been in the darkness too long.
Become awakened to a new world, and see it with your own eyes.
Welcome and be welcomed to the province of Naibu, far from the dirt where you hail.
Be rejuvenated, and spread your light to those who need it.
Only then will you truly shine.
Emere, it's time for you to awaken.
(I can't put my finger on it, but something feels different. I feel butterflies in my chest.)
(...Maybe I'm catching a cold or something and just had a bad fever dream.)
(Whatever, I'm hungry, I'll get some breakfast.)
